name: example-web-history
title: Example Web App (with History)
description: Example configuration for a web app with browser history lookup enabled. The script will find the most recently visited matching URL from browser history, or fall back to the default_url if none found.

name: example-web-hardcoded
title: Example Web App (Hardcoded)
description: Example configuration for a web app with a hardcoded URL. The script will always open the default_url, ignoring browser history.

name: example-local-file
title: Example Local PDF
description: Example configuration for opening a local PDF file. Use URL-encoded paths for spaces and special characters (e.g., %20 for spaces).

name: example-multi-domain
title: Example Multi-Domain
description: Example configuration matching multiple domains. Useful when a service uses multiple domains or subdomains.
